title: Oversight Minister (Priest in Charge, Vicar Designate)
text:
The Parish of St Thomas and St James with St Luke's Worsborough
Location:
Yorkshire and Lincs
Recruiter:
Sheffield Diocese
The Parish of St Thomas and St James with St Luke’s Worsborough is seeking an inspirational Priest, enthusiastic about teamwork, positive about working across different traditions, and committed to the development of lay leadership.
The appointment is one of three Oversight Ministers sharing in the ministry of the Lamplight Mission Area, comprising 7 parishes in the Tankersley Deanery. The Mission Area is on a journey of exploration and change that will ultimately lead to Pastoral re-organisation.
This is an exciting opportunity to share in the development of a new collaborative approach to ministry and mission working across this newly formed Mission Area serving a diverse socio-economic area.
For an information pack visit: www.sheffield.anglican.org/vacancies
For and informal chat contact:
Ven Javaid Iqbal, Archdeacon of Doncaster, on 07469 850723
CLOSING DATE: 17 June 2024
INTERVIEW DATE: 8 July 2024
This post is subject to an enhanced DBS disclosure.
Parish of Kingswinford
We seek a Pioneer Priest for our parish and genuinely want the person appointed to exercise the pioneer ministry which God has called them to, as we journey alongside them.
St John's, Harborne, Diocese of Birmingham
We are seeking a new Vicar to lead a large evangelical charismatic church in southwest Birmingham.
Benefice of Winnersh Sonning Deanery
We pray for a priest who will bring about the changes that are needed to reinvigorate the two churches within the parish. This will require a practical, creative and empathetic thinker who can discern and develop the gifts that lie within the two congregations to help us strengthen links with our community.
St Peter’s, Musselburgh
We are a faithful, inclusive and welcoming congregation. We trust in God’s transforming message revealed in the Bible and seek to honour His will as we grow in faith together and share the gospel with those around us.
The Hertford Benefice, Scarborough Deanery
This is a great opportunity for an evangelical charismatic who can lead us on in extending the Kingdom of God here, and who loves rural life and ministry.
Interim Vicar for the Benefice of Aldbrough St John, Forcett and Melsonby (0.5) and Diocesan Rural Change Enabler (0.5)
The Bishop of Ripon and the Benefice of Aldbrough St John, Forcett and Melsonby are looking to appoint a priest to the joint post of Interim Vicar (0.5) and Diocesan Rural Change Enabler (0.5).
Benefice of Walkingham Hill
We are looking forward to welcoming a new incumbent to support and lead us in the development of our mission and walk with us on our Christian journey.
Selby Abbey
We invite applications for an ALTO Choral Scholar/ Section Leader role at Selby Abbey beginning in September 2024, or soon as possible afterwards.
